problem.markdown:
>>For a two-machine finite-buffer line, improving a non-bottleneck machine: << (x) Increases the production rate of the system.
( ) Does not change the production rate of the system.
( ) Decreases the production rate of the system.
[explanation] See video 5 (slide 75). [explanation]

multiplechoiceresponse.label: For a two-machine finite-buffer line, improving a non-bottleneck machine:

choicegroup.choice: Increases the production rate of the system.
Does not change the production rate of the system.
Decreases the production rate of the system.
